rules.name: CH_InboundEmailQualification_Outcome_ChoiceRejected_solution
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8)
rules.label: Rejected - Solution

rules.name: CH_InboundEmailQualification_Outcome_ChoiceRejected_Restore
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8)
rules.label: Rejected - Restore

rules.name: CH_InboundEmailQualification_Outcome_ChoiceRejected_TempSolution
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8)
rules.label: Rejected - Temp Solution
